author: China Insights-SOHTV
description:
#father #Solo #play 
In many families today, parenting looks more like a one-person job. Moms carry the load, while some dads seem to vanish behind a screen—or into the bathroom for an hour-long “scroll session.”

From funny kid quotes to tired moms doing it all, we explore the modern version of “parenting teamwork” (or lack thereof).

🎬 This isn’t just about family roles—it’s about emotional presence, shared responsibility, and what happens when the balance breaks.

If you've ever been “parenting solo” with someone right next to you, this one’s for you.

👶💬 “Dad, are you still watching those videos?”
🛁💤 “Let me nap. You're just being dramatic.”
title: DAD? Sorry, He’s on the Toilet Again｜China Insights｜
